content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://root@synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Nation (
	[N_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[N_REGIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'tpch/NATION/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Nation
GO

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PART/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://root@synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE customer (
	[C_CUSTKEY] numeric(9,0),
	[C_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ADDRESS] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[C_PHONE] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ACCTBAL] numeric(9,2),
	[C_MKTSEGMENT] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'tpch/CUSTOMER/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PART/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/ORDERS/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

Create View PartView as (
SELECT  * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PART/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
      P_PARTKEY DECIMAL(12,0), 
      P_NAME varchar(MAX),
      P_MFGR varchar(max),
	  P_BRAND varchar(1000),
	  P_TYPE varchar(100),
	  P_CONTAINER varchar(50),
	  P_RETAILPRICE numeric(9,0),
	  P_COMMENT varchar(max)
) as rows
)

Select top 100 * from PartView

Create View NationView as (
SELECT  * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/NATION/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
    [N_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[N_REGIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
) as rows
)

Create View CustomerView as (
SELECT  * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/CUSTOMER/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
	[C_CUSTKEY] numeric(9,0),
	[C_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ADDRESS] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[C_PHONE] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ACCTBAL] numeric(9,2),
	[C_MKTSEGMENT] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
) as rows
)

Create View OrderView as (
SELECT  * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/ORDERS/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
	[O_ORDERKEY] decimal(12,0),
	[O_CUSTKEY] decimal(12,0),
	[O_ORDERSTATUS] nvarchar(100),
	[O_TOTALPRICE] numeric(38,0),
	[O_ORDERDATE] DATE,
	[O_ORDERPRIORITY] varchar(200),
	[O_CLERK] nvarchar(100),
	[O_SHIPPRIORITY] decimal(38,0),
	[O_COMMENT] varchar(max)
) as rows
)


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/LINEITEM/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

Create View LineitemView as (
SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/LINEITEM/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
	[L_ORDERKEY] decimal(12,0),
	[L_PARTKEY] decimal(12,0),
	[L_SUPPKEY] decimal(12,0),
	[L_LINENUMBER] decimal(12,0),
	[L_QUANTITY] decimal(12,0),
	[L_EXTENDEDPRICE] numeric(38,0),
	[L_DISCOUNT] numeric(38,0),
	[L_TAX] numeric(38,0),
	[L_RETURNFLAG] varchar(200),
	[L_LINESTATUS] varchar(200),
	[L_COMMITDATE] DATE,
	[L_RECEIPTDATE] DATE,
	[L_SHIPINSTRUCT] varchar(max),
	[L_SHIPMODE] varchar(max)
) as rows
)


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PARTSUPP/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

drop view PartSuppView;
Create View PartSuppView as (
SELECT * FROM
OPENROWSET( BULK N'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PARTSUPP/**', FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH (
    [PS_PARTKEY] decimal(38,0),
	[PS_SUPPKEY] decimal(38,0),
	[PS_AVAILQTY] decimal(38,0),
	[PS_SUPPLYCOST] decimal(38,4),
	[PS_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
) as rows
)

Create View RegionView as (
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/REGION/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
)

Create View SupplierView as (
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/SUPPLIER/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
)

select Top 100 * from SupplierView


Select top 100 * from OrderView a join LineitemView b on a.O_ORDERKEY = L_ORDERKEY
join CustomerView c on a.O_CUSTKEY = c.C_CUSTKEY
